manager.changelog:
- New work from the last commit in TeamVanced/VancedManager 
- Made all changelogs visible in the Commit History 
- App signature changed

vanced.changelog:
Nova Atualização :) 

- Nova base 17.36.37 
- Variação entre os temas escuro e preto (escolher dentro do manager) 
- Bugfix: Trying trySetDislikes even when OldLayout is not on, causing performance degradation 
- Bugfix: The function to remove the Download button in Button Container (Experimental) does not work in the new interface. 
- Change voting button resource 
- Code optimization 

KNOWN ISSUES: 
- Ads still showing on some devices 
- RYD not working on new interface
- HDR Brightness setting not working on some devices
